text_block_list.text: One day, at training…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh. Yeah, I thought so…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, uh, my horseshoes. I thought something felt a little off 
while I was running back there.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And now I see why. Look at that, they're worn completely flat 
already. Guess it's time to buy some more.
choice_data_list: Just goes to show how hard you're training!
Just goes to show how hard you're training!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes, thank you. Compliment gratefully received.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
So, uh, hey, are you free on Sunday? You couldn't come 
with me and help pick out some new shoes, could you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You know how it is. They got all kinds of fancy ones, but I 
always just end up buying the same ones I always do.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But I thought maybe if you came along you might be able 
to help me find something that works better for me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wonderful. Alright then, we're going shopping!
Then, that Sunday…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You know, I always just get everything at the 
shop on campus… I feel a little nervous coming 
to a fancy specialist place like this…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And just look at all the stuff they've got. There's 
so many different kinds of shoes here, I've no 
idea how to tell the good ones apart.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Now, watermelons? Those I can do! I got the nice 
old lady at the greengrocer's to show me how to 
pick the sweet ones every time! But shoes…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Well, trainer-san, that's your cue! You'll find me 
something just right, now, won't you?

So I talked Nice Nature through the pros and cons of all the 
different designs and variations, until we settled on a pair we 
thought was just right.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Heehee… I can't wait to try these out. Just what kind of shoes 
have you chosen for me I wonder…?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But you really do have a good eye… you know all about 
my form, how I push against the ground when I run…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I guess that's why you're a professional, huh. You're watching 
every little detail… I'm impressed!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Welp… guess we should be getting back to the academy before… ah.

Nice Nature looked like she'd noticed something, 
and went over to look in a nearby shop window.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I recognize that outfit. I saw it in that magazine the other 
day… wow, it's really something when you see it up close…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Maybe just a little too girly, though…? 
But I do like that color… hmmm…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Sorry, sorry! Look at me, just wandering off without saying 
anything. Something just kind of caught my eye, that's all.
choice_data_list: That's alright. Take all the time you need.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Nah, I'm fine. I wasn't going to buy it or anything…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You know how it is… even if you see an outfit in a magazine 
and you think it looks nice… when you get a chance to 
actually buy it you suddenly have a dozen reasons not to…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"Ah it probably just looks nice 'cause the model's pretty"… 
you know, that sort of thing.
choice_data_list: Well if you try it on then you'll know, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A-hahaha… yeah I'll know alright. Know how dumb I look!

Good afternoon! If I might assist you, 
the fitting rooms are right this way…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: N… no, I'm fine, really. I don't think it's my style.

Nonsense! Why, if we just raised those pigtails a tiny bit it 
would change your whole silhouette and match perfectly!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, you know you might be… ahh! You almost 
had me for a second there! You're good at this, huh!
choice_data_list: I think she's right, you could carry that off.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san!? Are you on their side too now? 
No, uh, I, um…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
A-hah! I already bought those nice horseshoes! My shopping 
budget's all spoken for already. Yeah, that's it!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
So! If you'll excuse, I really must be going, goodbye…! 
C'mon, Trainer-san, I said we're going.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whew, that was a close one. Almost got 
me into the changing room there.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I gotta say, I wasn't ready for you and that 
sales lady to gang up on me like that!
choice_data_list: Honestly, I think it would have looked good.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You just don't quit, do you!? Flattery'll 
get you nowhere, you know.
choice_data_list: You said it yourself: I've got a good eye!
You said it yourself: I've got a good eye!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, for training stuff! What are 
you my personal stylist now, too!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ugh. All I wanted was a pair of shoes. 
Why does this have to be so stressful…?

Nice Nature was happy to let me pick out her horseshoes, but 
letting me pick out her clothes was obviously a step too far.
